article_title: Hostile candidates really love each other!
article_text:

01:44 Interview with woman who almost lost daughter to liposuction procedure

00:36 Opa-locka commissioner facing corruption charges killed

02:51 Miami-Dade judge pioneers Criminal Mental Health Project

article_metadata.title: Hostile candidates really love each other! | Miami Herald

og.description: Deep down, Republicans love Democrats, and Democrats love Republicans. What’s more, Republican candidates love one another, as do Democrats running for the presidency.
